Contributing¶

If you are interested in contributing, make sure you install the development requirements using:

pip install -r requirements-dev.txt

Right now the repository is being developed by Albert Lionelle at Northeastern University. Please reach out to him for more information.

Building Documentation¶

To build the documentation, run the following command:

make html

inside the docs folder.
